titleInfo.title: La maison d'Araby Pacha à l'Arsenal

mods.abstract: Alexandria, Egypt; the house of Araby Pasha at arsenal with a troop of soldiers standing before entrance; taken during Arab revolt of 1882. "3 La maison d'Araby Pacha à l'Arsenal Fiorillo Phot." in white along bottom.

titleInfo.title: Nineteenth and Early Twentieth Century Images of Egypt

location.physicalLocation: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture
